summary: This little mod replaces the strange release sounds of skyrims bows with mount and blade: warbands release sound. I always quite liked that one...
descriptionHtml:
[u][center][/center][center][/center][/u][center][u]Desciption
[/u]
As an archer myself i always found Skyrims bow release sound a bit odd.
So i replaced them with the release sound (optional also the flesh impact sound) of Mount and Blade: Warband which is a bit more realistic

[u]Installation

[/u]Seriously, you know how to do it...


[u]Compatibility and known Issues[/u]
This is just a replacement of a few sound files so there won't be incompatibilities with other mods as there is [color=#ff0000]no esp[/color] file.
If you are using for example Immersive Sound - Compendium but you still want to replace this specific sounds, just install this mod after any sound replacing mod you have and overwrite all files.

[u]Video[/u]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YVM4D27-kbw&feature=youtu.be]Klick me![/url]

Mods seen in the Video:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65317/?]Nock to Tip[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64440/?]Real Bows[/url][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64440/?][/url][/center]
author: Kolgur

files.name: Bow Release Sound Replacement with Flesh Impact
